title: Fabulous 1375 sq ft, 2 bed, 2.5 bath. Access to bus and transportation
posting_body: ['East Perimeter Pointe Apartments', 'Visit Our Community Today!', '4946 Snapfinger Woods Dr.', 'Decatur, GA 30035', 'show contact info', 'The thriving neighborhood of East Decatur is uniquely suited to your apartment needs, offering peace and tranquility while keeping you engaged with the culture and excitement of the greater Atlanta area.', 'You can enjoy a mere 15-minute drive to downtown Decatur and a short 20-minute drive to the airport.', "You'll also have easy access to nearby Atlanta Transit for your commuting needs.", "There's simply no reason not to make these 'If there is more than one pet per unit, the combined weight of the 2 pets cannot exceed 50lbs.', 'For more information, please call our leasing office.', 'Lease-Length: 6-Month, 7-Month, 8-Month,
